name: Snake Classic
description: We all know we love snakes, right? Even if you afraid of snakes, u was in love by playing Snake game on your mobile phones while you was young. There was no sensor screen by the way, and all the buttons u press was manually pressed. And it was like playing piano - incredible!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7/8/10 Processor: Any Graphics: Any Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Any Graphics: Any Storage: 20 MB available space
